TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser extends System.Web.Security.MembershipUser

summary.span: 公开和更新 Active Directory 数据存储区中存储的成员资格用户信息。

span.span: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象用于表示 Active Directory 成员资格数据存储区中的单个成员资格用户。The object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store. 它公开成员资格用户的电子邮件地址，例如有关的信息，并提供成员资格用户，例如能够更改或重置其密码的功能。It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password. 每当应用程序配置为使用 Active Directory 数据存储时，应用程序的成员资格提供程序返回的对象。An object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store. 在可以配置的应用程序以使用不同的数据存储，或在使用多个数据存储的应用程序，您可以引用基类， 。In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, . 因为对象未实现并属性，您必须准备好处理上访问这些成员时引发的对象。Because the object does not implement the and properties, you must be prepared to handle the that is thrown when these members are accessed on an object. 类实现使用的内部优化类，以最大程度减少发生时调用的属性更新次数方法。The class implements internal optimizations used by the class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the method. 它还将序列化表示形式 (在可用属性)，以便对象可以序列化和反序列化而不引发异常。It also serializes the representation (available in the property) so that an object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions. 一个返回对象并方法或作为的一部分返回， ，和方法。A object is returned by the and methods or as part of a returned by the , , and methods. 对象所需的方法时想要更新现有成员资格用户的信息。An object is required by the method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user. 属性映射到 Active Directory 属性。 properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes. 下表列出了属性和其默认属性映射。The following table lists the properties and their default attribute mappings. |PropertyProperty|默认目录属性Default directory attribute|可以映射？Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| ||`securityIdentifier`|NoNo| ||`userPrincipalName`|是的但必须为 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountNameYes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| ||`comment`|NoNo| ||`whenCreated`|NoNo| ||`mail`|是的但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||n/an/a|不支持通过。Not supported by .| ||n/an/a|不支持通过。Not supported by .| ||`pwdLastSet`|NoNo| ||无，但如果使用密码重置或检索的问题和答案安全必须映射到属性。none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|是的但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||`User-Account-Control` (AD)`User-Account-Control` (AD)

`mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)`mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|NoNo| ||从计算`lockoutTime`和 AD 锁定持续时间 (在 Windows 2000 上的 AD)computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)

`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (在 Windows Server 2003 上的 AD)`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)

`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|NoNo| ||如果由于错误密码尝试次数过多而被锁定，则返回的锁定时间属性。If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.

如果锁定由于过多的错误的密码提示问题答案尝试，由定义的属性中存储的值`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`返回。If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.

如果因锁定的密码不正确和太多错误密码尝试次数，则返回的最新的日期/时间值。If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.

如果帐户未锁定，则返回 1/1/1753 的 SQL 兼容性。If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性上可能从多个成员资格数据存储返回用户信息的网页上的对象。The following code example demonstrates using properties on the object on a Web page that may return user information from multiple membership data stores. 因为对象提供支持对象返回的成员资格提供程序不实现和属性，代码首先检查返回从成员身份的用户对象的类型之前显示这些属性的内容提供程序。Because the object that underlies the object returned by the membership provider does not implement the and properties, the code first checks the type of the user object returned from the membership provider before displaying the contents of those properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/CS/admuClassExamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/VB/admuClassExamplevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新对象不会向成员资格数据存储区中添加新的成员资格用户对象。Creating a new object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store. 若要将新的成员资格用户添加到成员资格数据存储区中，使用方法。To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the method. 请注意，方法将返回成员资格用户添加到数据存储的对象。Note that the method returns an object for the membership user added to the data store. 通常用于应用程序代码中构造的对象方法，尽管也可以传递从返回的对象， ， ， ，或方法也方法。 objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the method, although you can also pass an object returned from the , , , , or method to the method as well. 对象通常也通过成员资格提供程序实现构造， ， ， ， ，并方法。 objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the , , , , , and methods.

summary.span: 获取或设置成员资格用户的应用程序特定信息。

span.span: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.

value.span: 存储在 目录特性中的 Active Directory 成员的特定于应用程序的信息。

span.span: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the directory attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于存储成员资格用户的特定于应用程序的自定义信息。The property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application. 可以存储在中的信息量`Comment`属性定义的。The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an is defined by the . 属性将映射到`Comment`默认 Active Directory 属性。The property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute. 此属性不能被重新映射到另一个属性。This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.

span.span: Gets or sets the email address of the membership user.

value.span: 成员资格用户的电子邮件地址。

span.span: The email address of the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将映射到`Mail`directory 属性。The property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute. 此属性可被重新映射在 Web.config 文件中通过设置`attributeMapUserName`中的属性[（ASP.NET 设置架构） profile 的 providers 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)配置文件的元素。This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示成员资格用户是否可以进行身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.

value.span: 如果可以对用户进行身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间对的调用检查成员资格用户的值通过。The value for a membership user is checked during the call to by the . 如果属性返回`false`，则方法将返回`false`即使提供的用户名和密码正确无误。If the property returns `false`, the method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct. 属性将映射到以下 Active Directory 属性之一。The property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes. ||| |-|-| |Active DirectoryActive Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory 应用程序模式Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| 此属性不能被重新映射到另一个属性。This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不受类。The property is not supported by the class. 尝试获取或设置值将始终引发。Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定成员资格用户的基础类型是否，并避免引发用于访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether the underlying type of a membership user is , and to avoid throwing a for accessing the property. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开从成员资格数据源以一般方式类型化为标识符`object`。The property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`. 类可以强制转换为对象。The class can be cast as a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示通过将其转换为安全描述符定义语言 (SDDL) 格式的属性对象。The following code example displays the property in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format by converting it to a object. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic.
